metadata.title: ASICS Men's Woven Training Short
features: Lightweight, durable, moisture management woven fabric
Mesh gusset for increased breathability and range of movement
description: For a short that offers distraction-free comfort and superior utility, both in and out of the gym, you'll love this new woven training short that also includes convenient storage.
